images.caption: Figure 1:Performance of leading models developed by diverse groups on industrial knowledge forKMMLU-Redux(left) and licensure exam pass status (indicated by) forKMMLU-Pro(right).

Figure 2:Performance differences in LLMs on the erroneous versus correct dataset. Leaked answer errors tend to overestimate model capabilities, while three other error types hinder LLMs to correctly predict true answers.

Figure 3:Performance of four LLMs on {Medical(left), Accounting(center), Law(right)}-relevant subsets from the MMMLU (Korean)(OpenAI,2024)andKMMLU-Pro. While the discrepancies in scores are narrow in the medicine domain, they are wider in law-related problems, emphasizing the need for datasets that reflecting real professional knowledge in Korea.
Figure 4:Performance of LLMs onKMMLUandKMMLU-Redux. A highœÅùúå\rhoitalic_œÅvalue indicates a strong correlation between the results of the two benchmarks.

Figure 5:Reasoning budget results of Qwen3-32B and Claude 3.7 Sonnet onKMMLU-Pro.rùëüritalic_rindicates the Pearson Correlation coefficient value between the reasoning token budget and the accuracy. The responses are sampled multiple times for each thinking budget setting;n=4ùëõ4n=4italic_n = 4andn=2ùëõ2n=2italic_n = 2, respectively, for Qwen and Claude. * and ** denote statistical significance, indicating p-value <0.05 and <0.01, respectively.
